an9.13:3.1: sukhavedanīyaṃ → sukhavedaniyaṃ (bj, cck, sya2ed, mr) | dukkhavedanīyaṃ → dukkhavedaniyaṃ (bj, cck, sya2ed, mr)
an9.13:21.1: Yaṃ khvassa, āvuso → yaṃ khvassāvuso (bj); yaṃ khossa āvuso (sya-all); yaṃ kho āvuso (mr) | vussatīti → vussati (sya-all), etthantare pāṭho sya-all, mr potthakesu
